description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Custard Bread Crust Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Custard tart,Pescatarian,High tea,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Mother's Day,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Custard Bread Crust Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180oC and grease two muffin tin holes with butter.
Push crusts into muffin tin holes.
Whisk together milk, sugar, egg and cocoa powder. Fill the crusts with mixture.
Bake for 20 minutes or until the crusts are just browned and the custard has only a slight wobble. Cool completely in the tray before removing carefully. Dust with icing sugar to serve.
